title: Did you blame Trump Obama for "bad" COVID-19 tests?
subtitle: It wasn't the first time the President of the United States had suggested that his predecessor was somehow responsible for the difficulties his administration had in responding to the Corona virus epidemic.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The President of the United States, Donald Trump, suggested that Obama's administration had left behind "bad" diagnostic tests, "broken" and "suspense" (COVID-19).
